statements: UPDATE CustomerSatisfactionData SET satisfaction_score = 4, feedback_text = 'Good service' WHERE survey_id = 1234;
UPDATE CustomerSatisfactionData SET feedback_text = 'Could improve communication', satisfaction_score = 3 WHERE customer_id = 5678;

UPDATE CustomerSatisfactionData SET satisfaction_score = 3, survey_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE customer_id = 201;
UPDATE SurveyData SET satisfaction_level = 5, comments = 'Great service' WHERE survey_id = 'e5b15aa6-1278-4c1b-943b-4a5a72882bdc';
UPDATE FeedbackData SET response_time = 24, feedback_text = 'Excellent experience' WHERE feedback_id = 'a37aa7e1-2f22-4bb9-b2a2-f771b897861a';
UPDATE SurveyData SET satisfaction_level = 5, comments = 'Great service' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE FeedbackData SET feedback_text = 'Improvement needed in response time', response_time = 3, feedback_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE feedback_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9101-210987654321'
UPDATE survey_responses SET satisfaction_score = 4 WHERE response_id = 101;
UPDATE feedback_comments SET comment_text = 'Good job!' WHERE response_id = 112;
UPDATE survey_responses SET satisfaction_score = 5, survey_date = '2021-09-20' WHERE response_id = 1001;
UPDATE feedback_comments SET comment_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, comment_text = 'Great service provided' WHERE response_id = 1001;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Smith' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_rating = 4, survey_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
